contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with Peter Pan
contact.subtitle: For any questions about iOS App development, feel free to contact Peter Pan anytime. When answering questions, Peter Pan also learns and grows in the process, makes friends, and gains rewards that money can't buy.
contact.qaColumn: Peter Pan's iOS Swift App Q&A Column
contact.fanpage: Fan Page: Peter Pan for Apple

books.subtitle: iOS App development books, from beginner to advanced, guiding you step by step to master Swift programming

tutoring.subtitle: Professional one-on-one App development tutoring to help you realize your ideas

vibeCoding.title: Your Personal APP VIBE CODING Coach
vibeCoding.description: In the AI era, everyone can develop Apps with AI. With years of App teaching experience, Peter Pan will assist you and guide you to complete your own App using AI.

appMentor.title: Your Personal Swift / Flutter APP Development Mentor
appMentor.description: Swift and Flutter are currently the hottest cross-platform App development technologies. With years of programming experience, Peter Pan will teach you App development knowledge one-on-one, helping you become a professional App engineer.

courses.subtitle: From beginner to advanced, diverse App development courses to guide you into the world of programming

swiftIosApp.title: Peter Pan's Swift iOS App Programming
swiftIosApp.description: Learn the latest iOS App development technologies - Swift, iOS SDK, and Xcode. Become a cool iOS App development wizard and realize your second life in App work, freelancing, or entrepreneurship!

swiftuiBeginner.title: iOS SwiftUI App Programming for Liberal Arts Students
swiftuiBeginner.description: Tailored for liberal arts students, learn programming from scratch, step by step! In just 12 weeks, one evening per week, you can master the core concepts of programming and become a cool iOS App development wizard!

flutterIntro.title: Flutter Cross-Platform App Programming
flutterIntro.description: Learn the latest Flutter cross-platform App development technologies - Dart, Flutter SDK, VS Code. Become a cool Flutter App development wizard and realize your second life in App work, freelancing, or entrepreneurship!

flutterCrossPlatform.title: Peter Pan's Flutter Cross-Platform App Programming
flutterCrossPlatform.description: Learn the latest Flutter cross-platform App development technologies - Dart, Flutter SDK, VS Code. Become a cool Flutter App development wizard and realize your second life in App work, freelancing, or entrepreneurship!

apcsAiotCamp.title: APCS Programming & AIoT Smart Applications Summer Camp
apcsAiotCamp.description: The first two and a half days focus on APCS courses, building a foundation with the hottest programming language Python. The instructor will use fun interactive teaching to help students gradually understand APCS concepts and practice problem types.

youthIosTraining.title: Youth Vocational Training iOS App Development

iosRestApi.title: iOS APP Project - REST API Integration for Social APP
iosRestApi.description: Beginners usually develop small Apps with two or three pages, rarely having experience developing complex Apps. This course will guide students to develop a social App comparable to published Apps, mastering the essential REST API integration skills for iOS App engineers.

firstSwiftuiApp.title: First Handmade iOS SwiftUI App
firstSwiftuiApp.description: Everyone has the talent to create Apps - it's time to unlock it! A hands-on iOS App course for beginners, teaching you to build Apps you love (like a beloved pet App or a sweet relationship App), installed on your own or friends' and family's iPhones to enjoy anytime.

christmasGiftApp.title: iOS App Workshop 6 - SwiftUI Christmas Gift Exchange App
christmasGiftApp.description: Develop a Christmas gift exchange App using SwiftUI

appDevSwiftBook.title: iOS App Workshop 3 - App Development with Swift eBook Code Analysis
appDevSwiftBook.description: Analyze Apple's App Development with Swift eBook code examples

swiftuiEbook.title: iOS App Workshop 5 - Create eBook App with SwiftUI
swiftuiEbook.description: Create an eBook App using SwiftUI

wwdc19Workshop.title: iOS App Workshop 4 - WWDC19 New Technology Sharing
wwdc19Workshop.description: WWDC19 New Technology Sharing - Xcode 11, iOS 13 & SwiftUI

ticTacToe.title: iOS App Workshop 2 - University of Chicago Tic-Tac-Toe App
ticTacToe.description: Learn to build the University of Chicago Stanford's Tic-Tac-Toe App

swiftRecursiveIterative.title: Classic CS Problems in Swift 1: Recursive & Iterative
swiftRecursiveIterative.description: A classic programming problem workshop for Swift iOS App development beginners.

programmingBeginnerTalk.title: How Beginners Learn Programming & Engineer Career Talk

swiftProgrammingIntro.title: Peter Pan's Swift Programming Introduction
swiftProgrammingIntro.description: Swift is Apple's new-generation programming language - concise, easy to understand, fast, and safe. With its Open Source release, Swift can not only develop iOS Apps but also Linux, Windows, Android, and even backend Apps. Now is the perfect time to learn Swift. This course uses the book 'Peter Pan's Swift Programming Introduction' to guide students through 12 hours of Swift syntax and features!

autoLayoutStackView.title: Deep Dive into Auto Layout and Stack View
autoLayoutStackView.description: Peter Pan will teach all the secrets about Auto Layout and Stack View through lectures and hands-on exercises. Creating App interfaces that adapt to various screen sizes will no longer be a challenge!

musickitLoveSong.title: Creating a MusicKit Love Song App

liberalArtsFirstApp.title: Liberal Arts Students' First iOS App Experience
liberalArtsFirstApp.description: Tailored for liberal arts students, learn programming from scratch and have fun building Apps! In just 2 weekends, 14 hours, you can master core programming concepts and develop your first iOS App!

qa.subtitle: Everything you need to know before learning iOS App development

iosQA.title: 10 Q&A About iOS App Development
iosQA.description: The ten most frequently asked questions about iOS App development, answered all at once

preparation.title: Preparation Before Learning Swift iOS App Development
preparation.description: What do you need to prepare before starting to learn? A complete guide from equipment to mindset

promises.title: Peter Pan's 8 Promises for iOS App Teaching
promises.description: Peter Pan's commitment to every student: teaching with heart, sharing with sincerity

resources.description: Curated Swift iOS App learning resources, from beginner to advanced

puzzles.title: Peter Pan's 999 SwiftUI / UIKit / Flutter / Jetpack Compose Puzzles
puzzles.description: Practical exercise library, learn by doing, challenge yourself

realApp.title: Peter Pan's Real iOS App UI Recreation
realApp.description: Learn to recreate real App UIs and features, improve practical skills
